{{'Bt_chnl_instruct_webhook_incmg_label'| i18nString}}

{{'Bt_chnl_instruct_webhook_uincmng_desc'| i18nString}}

    payload : {
        "session" : { //In case of synchronous if user wants to start a new session.           
                "new" : true
                },
    "message":{
                    "text" : "Hi",
                    "attachments" : <attachment links as array of objects. For example: [{"url":"https://- - "}]>
                },
        "from" :{
                "id": <unique-id-of-sender(mandatory)>,
                "userInfo" :{
                                "firstName" : <first-name(optional)>,
                                "lastName" : <second-name(optional)>,
                                "email" : <email(optional)>
                            }
                },
    "to" :{
                "id": <unique-id-of-recipient(mandatory)>,
                "groupInfo" : { //If message comes from a group/team/room                        
                                "id" : <unique-id-of-group>,
                                "name": <group-name(optional)>
                            }
            }
                        }

{{'Bt_chnl_instruct_webhook_synres_label'| i18nString}}

                            {
                                "text' : "message"
                            }

{{'Bt_chnl_instruct_webhook_assynres_label'| i18nString}}

                            {
                                 "text" : "message",
                                 "to" : "to_id",
                                 "from" : "from_id"
                            }

{{'Bt_chnl_instruct_webhook_incmg_label'| i18nString}}

{{'Bt_chnl_instruct_webhook_uincmng_desc'| i18nString}}

    payload : {
        "session" : { //In case of synchronous if user wants to start a new session.           
        "new" : true
        },
    "message":{
            "type": "text/event/template",
            "val": "Hi/ON_CONNECT/{}",
            "attachments" : <attachment links as array of objects. [{'url':'https://- - '},{ "fileName": "Kore_ai_Logo%405x.png", "fileType":"image", "fileId": "6163e17bf60e0a7e4799f423" }]>
            },
    "from" :{
        "id": <unique-id-of-sender(mandatory)>,
        "userInfo" :{
                        "firstName" : <first-name(optional)>,
                        "lastName" : <second-name(optional)>,
                        "email" : <email(optional)>
                    }
            },
    "to" :{
        "id": <unique-id-of-recipient(mandatory)>,
        "groupInfo" : { //If message comes from a group/team/room                        
                        "id" : <unique-id-of-group>,
                        "name": <group-name(optional)>
                      } 
          }
    "mergeIdentity":,
    "metaTags": {// metatags to be captured for this message
            "userLevelTags": [<array of objects: To capture user tags>],
            "sessionLevelTags": [[<array of objects: To capture session tags>]],
            "messageLevelTags": [<array of objects: To capture message tags>]
               },
        "preferredChannelForResponse": "" //the channel context to be used to generate a response 

    }

{{'Bt_chnl_instruct_webhook_synres_label'| i18nString}}

                                        Sample#1:
                                        {
                                           "data": [
                                               {
                                                   "type": "text",
                                                   "val": "Sample message for Message0014",
                                                   "createdOn": "2021-10-11T13:44:34.675Z"
                                               }
                                           ],
                                           "_v": "v2",
                                           "pollId": "7b7a5a74d8395a31d2495168a9e6deb6"
                                        }{
                                        }
                                        Sample#2:
                                        {
                                             "data": [      
                                              "type": "template",
                                              "val": {
                                               "name":"John",
                                               "age":30
                                              },

                                            }
                                            ],
                                          "_v": "v2",

                                          "endReason": "Fulfilled",
                                          "completedTaskId": "dg-f8bea693-fd41-5c48-a1da-b53693ba3eb8",
                                          "completedTaskName": "dialog1"
                                        }
